CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1962, pg. 1 reads:" Need For Probe? - With a $13 million defense order from the U.S. Government, Firth-Sterling, a giant McKeesport industrial concern, has 1,563 workers, of whom only five are Negroes. The McKeesport NAACP is looking into the employment pattern. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Firth Sterling Incorporated with Ford car parked in front and trains in yard on left, McKeesport, another version
